QUAD model

The QUAD model

QUAD(x, ...)

# S3 method for BasicRaster
QUAD(x, ...)

Arguments

x

raster alike
...

ignored

Value

QUAD model

Examples

QUAD(raster::raster(volcano))
#> $object
#> # A tibble: 1 x 7
#>   object_  xmin  xmax  ymin  ymax  nrow  ncol
